description: Percentage liquid-cloud cover as seen by the MODIS instrument simulator. Dimensions of LWP (cloud liquid water path) and r\_eff (droplet effective radius).
processing-note:
7 LWP levels x 6 effective radius levels. NOTE: "p1000" is chosen as a coordinate to enable form submission and should be ignored.  An extra dimension of LWP should also be added to this request (although it is not an option in the form).

[BD removed the p1000 coordinate on 4/9/24]
title: MODIS Liquid Topped Cloud Area Fraction

review.atmosphere-review-comment:
Atmosphere team happy to accept variable.

Moved back to in progress, as it has been noted that there are duplicate compound names. Could suggest to the author to submit new physical parameters to avoid this.

NOTE need to add extra dimension 'LWP'
